header.title: Nonzas (are not Stanzas)
header.abstract: This specification defines the term "Nonza" as every top level stream element that is not a Stanza.

section1.p: The usage of non-Stanza top level stream elements is steadily increasing in the last years. Starting with XEP-198: Stream Management, which is the first XEP which specified and used additional non-stanza top level stream elements, the XMPP community sees an increasing usage of those elements in submitted specifications. Unlike Stanzas which are specified in "&rfc6120; ยง 8. XML Stanzas", there is no term and definition provided for them .

This leads to the situation where some submitted XEPs errornous refer to non-Stanza top level stream elements as "Stanzas". Thus causing confusion, and opening the door to possible interoperability breakage and security vulnerabilities.
This XEP tries to fix this by providing a term and a definition for those top level elements.
Nonza: A Nonza is every top level stream element which is not a Stanza.
